actions.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas S. Foley, a Representative from the State of Washington, Speaker, and Donnald K. Anderson, a citizen of the State of California, Clerk of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Informs the President that the Honorable Thomas S. Foley has been elected Speaker of the House of Representatives and that Donnald K. Anderson has been elected Clerk.

titles.title: Authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the President that the House of Representatives has elected Thomas S. Foley, a Representative from the State of Washington, Speaker, and Donnald K. Anderson, a citizen of the State of California, Clerk of the House of Representatives.
